text: Fear Strikes Out is a 1957 American biographical drama movie directed by first time director Robert Mulligan and was based on the 1955 memoir of the same name by Jimmy Piersall. It stars Anthony Perkins, Karl Malden, Adam Williams, Perry Wilson and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1957 drama movies Category:1950s biographical movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Robert Mulligan Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Boston
title: Fear Strikes Out
